AriAstro documentation¶

Add your content using reStructuredText syntax. See the reStructuredText documentation for details.

AriAstro is a Python package for combining and analyzing astronomical FITS files. It provides tools to average, add, subtract, or divide spectra/images and perform continuum normalization with error propagation.
